MessageAdapter
class MessageAdapter.MyViewHolder extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding the view elements of each item.

  • Method Details

    • configureView

      void configureView(Message message, boolean isCurrentUser, int position)
      Configures the view based on the message and whether the sender is the current user.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object containing the message data.
      isCurrentUser - Boolean indicating if the sender is the current user.
      position - The position of the current item in the list.

    • configureRightView

      void configureRightView(Message message, int position)
      Configures the view for messages sent by the current user.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object containing the message data.
      position - The position of the current item in the list.

    • configureLeftView

      void configureLeftView(Message message, int position)
      Configures the view for messages sent by other users.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object containing the message data.
      position - The position of the current item in the list.

    • loadProfileImage

      void loadProfileImage(android.widget.ImageView imageView, String userId, int position, String currentSenderId)
      Loads the profile image for the user.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView to load the profile image into.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      position - The position of the current item in the list.
      currentSenderId - The ID of the current sender.
